app.description: Forms is a simple form builder that allows you to create forms and collect data from your users.

edit.title: Edit Response
edit.description: View or edit a form response

formsAppId.label: Forms app
formsAppId.helperText: Select the Forms app that provides the form.

form.preview: Form block (form will be displayed on the page)

archive.title: Archive form
archive.description: Archive form {name}? It will be hidden from your website and no new responses can be added.

unarchive.title: Unarchive form
unarchive.description: Unarchive form {name}? It will be visible again and accept new responses.

archiveSelected.label: Archive {count, plural, =1 {form} other {# forms}}
archiveSelected.description: Archive {count, plural, =1 {selected form} other {# selected forms}}? They will be hidden from your website and no new responses can be added.

unarchiveSelected.label: Unarchive {count, plural, =1 {form} other {# forms}}
unarchiveSelected.description: Unarchive {count, plural, =1 {selected form} other {# selected forms}}? They will be visible again and accept new responses.

delete.title: Delete Form
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete form {name}? This action cannot be undone.

deleteSelected.label: Delete selected {count, plural, =1 {form} other {# forms}}
deleteSelected.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count, plural, =1 {selected form} other {# selected forms}}? This action cannot be undone.
deleteSelected.confirm: Delete {count, plural, =1 {selected form} other {# selected forms}}

delete.title: Delete Response
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this response?

reassign.title: Reassign customer
reassign.description: Choose a customer to assign this response to. You can clear the selection to unassign.

reassignSelected.label: Reassign customer ({count, plural, =1 {# response} other {# responses}})
reassignSelected.title: Reassign customer for {count, plural, =1 {selected response} other {# selected responses}}
reassignSelected.description: Choose a customer to assign the selected responses to. You can clear to unassign.

deleteSelected.label: Delete selected {count, plural, =1 {response} other {# responses}}
deleteSelected.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count, plural, =1 {selected response} other {# selected responses}}? This action cannot be undone.
deleteSelected.confirm: Delete {count, plural, =1 {selected response} other {# selected responses}}

edit.title: Edit Response
edit.customerRequired: Please select a customer for this response.
edit.customerRequiredNotice: This form only accepts responses from identified participants. A customer must be assigned.

form.archivedNotice: This form is archived. Only the name can be edited.

enabled.label: Enable email notifications
enabled.description: Send email notifications to the email address when a form is submitted

email.label: Email address
email.description: Optional email address to send notifications to. If not provided, the default email address will be used

requireCustomerId.label: Restrict to identified participants
requireCustomerId.description: Only allow submissions from people you've invited or who have an access link. Ideal for intake forms, applications, or any form that should not be filled by anonymous visitors.

toasts.requestError: There was a problem with your request

fields.title: Fields
fields.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this field?

name.label: Field name
name.description: Unique ID of the field. Can contain only letter, digits, and underscore (_)

label.label: Field label
label.description: Label that will be shown to the user

description.label: Field description
description.placeholder: This is a description for the field
description.description: Help text that will be shown to the user

required.label: Required
required.description: Whether the field is required. If field has multiple choices, at least one selection is required

options.label: Field options
options.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this option?

minSelected.label: Minimum selected
minSelected.description: Optional minimum number of selected options.

maxSelected.label: Maximum selected
maxSelected.description: Optional maximum number of selected options.

maxSizeMb.label: Max file size (MB)
maxSizeMb.description: Max allowed file size in megabytes

minLength.label: Minimum length
minLength.description: Optional minimum length of the text.

maxLength.label: Maximum length
maxLength.oneLineDescription: Optional maximum length of the text. Default value is 64 characters.
maxLength.multiLineDescription: Optional maximum length of the text. Default value is 1024 characters.

name.required: Field name should be at least 2 characters long
name.max: Field name should be no more than 64 characters long
name.invalid: Field name should start with letter and contain only letters, digits, and underscore (_)

description.min: Description should be at least 10 characters
description.max: Description should be not more than 256 characters

value.min: Option should be at least 2 characters
value.max: Option should be not more than 256 characters

minLength.invalid: Minimum length should be a positive integer number

maxLength.invalid: Maximum length should be a positive integer number

minMaxRange.invalid: Minimum length should not be larger than maximum length value

maxLength.max: Maximum length should be not larger than 256 characters
Maximum length should be not larger than 4096 characters

minSelected.invalid: Should be a positive integer number

maxSelected.invalid: Should be a positive integer number

minMaxRange.invalid: Minimum selected should not be larger than maximum selected value

maxSizeMb.min: File max size should be at least 1MB
maxSizeMb.max: File max size should be not larger than 100MB

fields.min: Form should have at least 1 field
fields.unique: Form fields should have unique names and labels

email.invalid: Should be a valid email address

name.max: Form name should be not more than 64 characters
